mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_bins (user_id, name, file_path, remark, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{name}, #{filePath}, #{remark}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user_bins WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId} LIMIT 1
SELECT id, user_id, name, file_path, remark, created_at, updated_at FROM user_bins WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM user_bins WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
